misc: Rarely uses his driver, which has raised questions about his masculinity.
biography: Ossi, a competitor hailing from the esteemed Kullo Golf Club, brings a unique and often debated approach to the game. Known for his strategic play, Ossi has become a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, with the upcoming 2025 edition marking his third appearance.

Despite his experience in the tournament, Ossi is yet to secure a victory at the Hector Trophée or claim the individual Victor Trophy. However, his consistent presence underscores his dedication to the sport and the tournament.

Off the course, Ossi is a figure of intrigue, particularly due to his rare use of the driver. This peculiar choice has often sparked discussion, with some observers even questioning his masculinity. Nevertheless, Ossi remains steadfast in his methods, proving that in golf, as in life, there is more than one path to success.
